name: Lazarus Group Operation Blacksmith
description: This layer represents the tactics, techniques, and procedures (TTPs) used by the Lazarus Group in their Operation Blacksmith campaign.

techniques.comment: Exploitation of CVE-2021-44228 (Log4Shell) for initial access to publicly facing VMWare Horizon servers.
Execution of various commands and scripts for reconnaissance and lateral movement.
Creation of a new user account with administrative privileges for hands-on-keyboard activity.
Use of HazyLoad, a custom-made proxy tool, to maintain persistent access to infected systems.
Use of credential dumping utilities such as ProcDump and MimiKatz to harvest credentials.
Use of Telegram-based C2 channel for accepting commands, communicating outputs, and file transfer in NineRAT.
Execution of various commands for system information discovery and software discovery.
